typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Order
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrderDetail
Order, OrderDetail join(Order@OrderID == OrderDetail@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> OrderJoin
JoinSelect derive(SourceSystemID = 1,
		GlobelOrderID = uuid()) ~> SRDC
OrderJoin select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = Order@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate = Order@CreatedDate,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		UpdatedDate = Order@UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> JoinSelect
SRDC sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Factordertransaction.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true) ~> TargetOrderTransaction
